rows.label: tlk70000120_04_msg0001
rows.name:
Hey...
So the Iiran capital was attacked...
I hope the people there are safe.

rows.label: tlk70000120_04_msg0002
rows.name:
You thought I'd be more gung-ho
about it, did you? Thought I'd want
a piece of the action?

rows.label: tlk70000120_04_msg0003
rows.name:
No... When I heard about that Grail
person, it chilled me to the bone.
Me of all people!

rows.label: tlk70000120_04_msg0004
rows.name:
I hear he's burned cities to the
ground without a trace. Urgh...

rows.label: tlk70000120_04_msg0005
rows.name:
But you're going to protect the city
and the people, aren't you?

rows.label: tlk70000120_04_msg0006
rows.name:
I have to say, I'm pretty jealous of
your strength and bravery...

rows.label: tlk70000120_04_msg0007
rows.name:
Well, I won't be beaten!
I'll just have to train even harder!
